website_summaries.verdict: This 100% all-natural dry food is made with several high-quality protein sources, fresh grains, and the added vitamins and minerals a hedgehog needs for a nutritionally complete diet.
pros: Blood meal, soybean meal, and ground corn are the first 3 ingredients
Includes large amounts of tasty dried mealworms
No artificial colors, flavors, or preservatives
cons: A fairly expensive meal, but this is a premium blend of hedgehog food

customer_reviews.title: I don't recommend
customer_reviews.text: This food includes ingredients that hedgehogs should not have: bloodmeal, ground corn, corn gluten meal are some of the main ingredients. Corn is actually really bad for them and so is bloodmeal. Also, the dried meal worms are known to constipate hedgehogs. They should only be given them as a treat every once in a while. Besides that fact, my hedgie personally did not like the food.
customer_reviews.author: S. Bray

customer_reviews.title: Great product,  overpriced here though.
customer_reviews.text: This food is the best I've found for my hedgie. He positively loves it! It's WAY cheaper to buy it direct though, so no more coming to Amazon for this particular product!
customer_reviews.author: Thomas_in_Austin

customer_reviews.title: Came all crumbled up and bugs! Quality going down every year.
customer_reviews.text: Been buying this for years, and the quality is consistently going down. Mealworm to pellet ratio went down. Getting more and more crumbles, even when freshly opened. This last bag even had spiderwebs, small black bugs and squirming larvae inside. Lost me as a loyal customer. Update: Exotic Nutrition sent me a replacement bag, along with a line-by-line response on corrective actions they took on their end, and recommendations on how to keep the food fresh on my end. (Refrigerate!) Impressed with the response and customer service attitude, and can tell the quality is indeed back to where it was. No more crumbles out of the bag!
customer_reviews.author: P Lau

customer_reviews.title: Only need one food
customer_reviews.text: When they say complete it truly is. You can see the mealworms in it. And my hedgehog loves it
customer_reviews.author: Charlotte teachen

customer_reviews.title: Good, but...
customer_reviews.text: I have two hedge hogs so I thought they would benefit from specialty food. However It’s an awfully small bag for the price, and they went through it so fast! They must have really loved it.
customer_reviews.author: Alli

customer_reviews.title: Seems nutritious
customer_reviews.text: My hedgehog loves this brand. Other brands are too hard or the pieces are too big. With this one, you can see the ground up worms etc in the mixture
customer_reviews.author: Jellybeans

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My hedgehog seems to enjoy this food along with his high end cat food.
customer_reviews.author: NLmom

customer_reviews.title: Hedgie said no
customer_reviews.text: Great company and great other products. My hedgie just says no to this one.
customer_reviews.author: WonderShanae

customer_reviews.title: Shipping was great
customer_reviews.text: Shipping was great thank you very much happy hedgehog is a happy hedgehog
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Miller

customer_reviews.title: Hedgehog wouldn’t touch it.
customer_reviews.text: My Hedgehog wouldn’t even touch this food. He went 2-3 without eating instead of trying it.
customer_reviews.author: DannyH

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely great food! Little pricey!
customer_reviews.text: My hedgehog absolutely loves it but it’s a little pricey for my taste soo I buy it to spoil her every & now then, generally I make my own mix like this
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Best food we've tried.
customer_reviews.text: This is the best brand we've tried so far. Iris loves it, and let's just say everything smells better!
customer_reviews.author: ccarl03

customer_reviews.title: Hedgie strongly dislikes this food!
customer_reviews.text: My hedgehog doesn’t even want to touch this stuff. I was told by the breeder to buy this for him so I went and spent $20 on a tiny bag and my Hedgie prefers cat food over this stuff. Every time I put this food in there he turns the bowl over.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole F.

customer_reviews.title: I guess he likes it
customer_reviews.text: my hedgehog is a fatty so I guess he loves it
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey McDonald

customer_reviews.title: Crummy
customer_reviews.text: We fed this to our hedgehog for a couple weeks but a 1/3 of this bag was dust... Not many pellets. We are dissapointed that we will have to throw some away because it was so expensive!
customer_reviews.author: MomOf3

customer_reviews.title: 2nd time I bought food was big clump in the ...
customer_reviews.text: 2nd time I bought food was big clump in the bag dont know if food got wet or not mixed well will probably order again?
customer_reviews.author: Shad B

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: My hedgie loves it! Took her a little to get used to it but it made her more active and healthy!!
customer_reviews.author: Ariiana D.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: This and dried mealworms are all they'll eat now. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Weatherford

customer_reviews.title: Hedgie loves it
customer_reviews.text: My hedgie is very picky but this is the first food he chows down on
customer_reviews.author: Jed

customer_reviews.title: my hedgehog doesn't like the food
customer_reviews.text: For some reason, my hedgehog doesn't like the food. It may be that she got used to the other food I buy her from our local pet store.
customer_reviews.author: by elias

customer_reviews.title: Expensive but good
customer_reviews.text: My little guy loves this stuff, a little expensive and he got fat. Made him move his bowels frequently.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Loves it
customer_reviews.text: My hedgehog loves this stuff he’s been eating it his whole life
customer_reviews.author: C3

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Are Hedgehog likes this better than cat food. He has a lot of energy and seems to feel good.
customer_reviews.author: CB

customer_reviews.title: Refused to eat
customer_reviews.text: My hedgehog was raised on the Mazuri Hedgehog diet and refused to eat this. The pellets are really big for a baby. We tried again when he was older but would not eat this product at all.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: okay- disappointing
customer_reviews.text: This food is okay. I was disappointed because it said it had meal worms and in the entire bag there was maybe 10. Also seem very dry and brittle. There a small hole in the bag when it arrived, perhaps that was part of the reason.
customer_reviews.author: Terri G.

customer_reviews.title: Hedgehog loves it.
customer_reviews.text: As soon as he smells me pouring his food into the bowl he comes running out.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Just what it is listed as. Sent on time and no problems.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love the larger size
customer_reviews.text: Love being able to buy a larger bag. We have 5 hedgehogs and the 2lbs bag doesn't last long. Fast shipping.
customer_reviews.author: focus gbi vCard f y

customer_reviews.title: Healthy Hedgehog Food
customer_reviews.text: Originally, I bought this hedgehog food to replace the food my hedgehogs came with when my husband bought them from the pet store. I'm glad I changed to this brand. My hedgehogs love it! The quality is excellent, and my packages always arrive earlier than expected.
customer_reviews.author: Taylor

product_meta.title: Hedgehog Complete - Nutritionally Complete Natural Healthy High Protein Pellets & Dried Mealworms - Food for Pet Hedgehogs
product_meta.description:
Size:5 lb.

Exotic Nutrition's popular Hedgehog Complete is a fortified, pellet-based diet that is scientifically blended to meet your hedgehogs' vitamin, mineral, amino acid, fiber and digestive enzyme needs.

NET WEIGHT: 5 lbs.

FEATURES:
✔ HEALTHY - delivering a vitamin-fortified complete diet that contains all the nutrition necessary for growth, reproduction and development.
✔100% NATURAL - no artificial colors, flavors, or preservatives
✔ NUTRITIOUS - Contains high-protein pellet mixed with fresh grains and dried mealworms
✔ COMPLETE - Nutritionally complete diet for Hedgehogs, fortified with vitamins & minerals
✔ RESEARCHED - Veterinarian approved - suitable for European, Asian, and African hedgehog
✔ QUALITY - made in small batches to ensure high/consistent quality
✔ LONG SHELF LIFE - Refrigerates up to 6 months and freezes up to 12 months

FEEDING INSTRUCTIONS:Offer approximately 3 tbsp of Hedgehog Complete to your pet daily. Adjust the amount fed to ensure your pet's optimum body weight. Provide live, canned, or dried insects weekly to vary the diet. Additional vitamins are not necessary if your pet's diet is made up of at least 75% Hedgehog Complete. Do not leave moistened food out for more than 12 hours, change out pellet food every 24 hours. Always provide fresh drinking water to your hedgehog.

PELLET STORAGE:Store bag in a cool, dry place (under 72 degrees). Refrigeration is highly recommended to retain full nutritional value. We recommend storing the bag of food in the refrigerator, taking out enough food for a week and keeping it in a sealed airtight container, and then refilling container with the refrigerated food. If storing for longer than 6 months, freeze (up to 12 months).
feature_bullets: ✔ 100% NATURAL - no artificial colors, flavors, or preservatives
✔ NUTRITIOUS Contains high-protein pellet mixed with fresh grains & dried mealworms
✔ HEALTHY Nutritionally complete diet for Hedgehogs, fortified with vitamins & minerals
✔ RESEARCHED Veterinarian approved - suitable for European, Asian, and African hedgehog

✔ FAST, FREE SHIPPING in USA! Avg 3 days! ZooPro sells exotic animal food and accessories that are manufactured by Exotic Nutrition Pet Supply Company. Exotic Nutrition has been the industry leader of exotic animal products since 1998, specializing in sugar gliders, hedgehogs, prairie dogs, marmosets, degus, skunks, opossums, chinchillas, rats, hamsters, gerbils, squirrels, rabbits, guinea pigs, rodents, ferrets, chickens, bluebirds, wild birds, monkeys, marsupials, reptiles, amphibians & more
